1.content:
THE YEAR: 2047
THE HUMANS OF EARTH HAVE ALL BUT BEEN WIPED OUT BY THE KAHL INVASION. IN A LAST DITCH EFFORT, SEVEN SPACE SHIPS CALLED SKY ARKS WERE BUILT TO HELP HUMANS ESCAPE THE INVASION AND FIND GREENER PASTURES. OF ALL THE SKY ARKS, ONLY SKY ARK 5 IS EQUIPPED WITH A SPACE FOLD ENGINE. THIS IS THE SHIP'S THIRD ATTEMPT IN SPACE FOLDING. WITH TWO ATTEMPTS TO FIND A HOSPITABLE WORLD TO COLONIZE, THE CREW FINALLY MAY HAVE FOUND A WORLD WORTH LIVING ON.

CHARACTERS:

CELESTE RAMIREZ - LEAD PILOT

DANtE - CAPTAIN

JOANNA - TERRAFORM EXPERT

KARINA - COMPUTER ENGINEER

MARCUS - PILOT / SECURITY

MIKO - GEOLOGY / BOTANY EXPERT

RINAYA - FIRST OFFICER

SHANNON - FLIGHT SURGEON

SAM - PILOT / SCIENCE OFFICER

ANGELA - STELLAR CARTOGRAPHY

BRIANNA - DEPUTIZED SECURITY / STOW AWAY

DEBRA - WEAPONS / TACTICAL
1.title: PROLOGUE & CHARACTERS

11.content:
RINAYA: STATUS REPORT.

SAM: APPROACHING THE FOURTH PLANET IN THIS SYSTEM. AIR SEEMS BREATHABLE.

RINAYA: SCAN FOR LIFE SIGNS LT. SMITH.

CELESTE: PULLING IN CLOSER. GOING FOR AN ORBITAL APPROACH.

MIKO: GETTING LOTS OF TECTONIC ACTIVITY, VOLCANISM, FRESH WATER LAKES.

RINAYA: THIS COULD BE WHAT WE'VE BEEN WAITING FOR.

CELESTE: LOOKS GOOD SO FAR COMMANDER.

SAM: NO ANIMAL LIFE SIGNS ON THE SURFACE, BUT I SEE A LOT OF UNDERGROUND ACTIVITY.

CELESTE: COULD BE TOO VOLCANIC FOR OUR NEEDS.

RINAYA: LET'S NOT JUMP THE GUN ON THIS WORLD. CELESTE, I WANT YOU TO TAKE AN AWAY TEAM DOWN TO INVESTIGATE.

CELESTE: YES COMMANDER.

AS THE SKY ARK 5 DRAWS CLOSER TO THE PLANET MORE INFORMATION BEGINS TO ROLL IN FROM PRELIMINARY SCANS. THE SHIP IS ALMOST WITHIN RANGE TO SEND A COMBAT SHUTTLE TO THE SURFACE OF THE PLANET.

SAM: STILL AL OT OF TECTONIC ACTIVITY BUT I THINK I FOUND A SUITABLE LANDING ZONE.

RINAYA: SO YOU JUST WANT TO SEND YOURSELF AND MIKO TO THE SURFACE?

CELESTE: THERE'S SO FEW OF US LEFT THAT IS WOULD BE A RISK TO SEND MORE THAN TWO AT A TIME.

RINAYA: MAKE IT SO.

CELESTE'S CRAFT ENTERS THE ATMOSPHERE OF THE STRANGE ROCKY WORLD

CELESTE: A LOT OF TURBULENCE, BUT I THINK I CAN MANAGE.

SLOWLY LANDS

CELESTE: THIS SPOT IS AS GOOD AS ANY.

THE TWO EXITS THE CRAFT

CELESTE: SO FAR SECURITY ISSUES ARE MINIMAL LOOKS GOOD.

MIKO: LOOKS LIKE MY ASSUMPTION IS CORRECT. THE ROCKS ARE ACTUALLY STRANGE FORM OF TREE. INSIDE ARE PHOTOSYNTHETIC PROTEINS.

CELESTE: AS OF NOW I SUGGEST THAT WE DO A THERMAL AND SEISMIC SCAN OF THE SUB SURFACE. I FEEL A LOT OF TREMORS DOWN HERE.

MIKO: UNLIMITED FOOD SOURCES. THIS PLANET IS A GOLD MINE. I CAN;T BELIEVE HOW LUCKY WE ARE. THIS PLACE IS ALMOST TOO GOOD TO BE TRUE, FRESH WATER, FOODS AND GEOTHERMAL HEAT FOR ENERGY!

CELESTE: STILL NOT COMFORTABLE WITH THE TREMORS.

MIKO: LET'S NOT GET ALL SCARED OF A FEW EARTHQUAKES. IT'S LIKE COLUMBUS BEING AFRAID OF WATER ON THE WAY TO THE NEW WORLD!

CELESTE: YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT'S DOWN THERE MIKO!

MIKO: COULD BE AN ISOLATED PLATE SHIFT! THIS WHOLE WORLD IS HUMONGOUS, WE COULD FIND ANOTHER SPOT!

UNKNOWN TO THE TWO A SNAKE-LIKE BEAST CRAWLS BEHIND THEM AND THEN HISSES. CELESTE DRAWS OUT HER PISTOL AND FIRES, BUT THE LASERS SIMPLY BOUNCES OFF.

CELESTE: YOU WERE SAYING?

THE LARGE SNAKE-LIKE BEAST SLOWLY MAKES IT'S WAY TOWARD THE OUTGUNNED AWAY TEAM. THE CREATURE APPEARED TO BE A SNAKE / DRAGON HYBRID. IT'S HUNGER WAS OBVIOUS TO THE FRIGHTENED GIRLS WHO WERE QUICKLY RUNNING OUT OF OPTIONS.

CELESTE: SKY ARK 5! THIS IS CELESTE! WE ARE ENCOUNTERING HOSTILES! COME ON YOU BASTARD! DIE ALREADY!

CELESTE FIRES ANOTHER SHOT STRAIGHT TO THE UNDERBELLY KILLING THE BEAST.

MIKO: GOOD SHOT CELESTE.

THE BEAST FALLS TO THE GROUND AND DIE.

CELESTE: SKY ARK 5 COM IN! WE ARE HEADING BACK TO REGROUP AND REPORT! WE GOTTA GET BACK TO THE SHIP!

MIKO: WE SHOULD TREAD CAREFULLY! THE CREATURES HERE MUST BE ABLE TO SENSE THE SEISMIC ACTIVITY OF OUR FOOTSTEPS.

CELESTE: WHAT DO YOU SUGGEST?

MIKO: WELL IF WE HAD TIME WE COULD WAIT FOR ANOTHER TRANSPORT.

CELESTE: WE DON'T HAVE THAT KIND OF TIME MIKO. I THINK WE SHOULD MAKE A BREAK FOR THE SHUTTLE!

MIKO: FOOLISH IDEA, WE SHOULD TRY TO STAY ON THE TREE FORMATIONS AS THEY WOULD ABSORB A LOT OF SOUNDWAVES OF US WALKING AS WE MAKE OUR WAY BACK TO THE SHUTTLE.

SUDDENLY A DINOSAUR LIKE CREATURE APPEARS FROM UNDERGROUND WITH ITS MOUTH OPEN BENEATH MIKO.

MIKO: WHA! HELP!

CELESTE: MIKO! NOO!

MIKO: IT'S EATING MEE!

CELESTE: M...M...MIKO!

CELESTE WATCHES HELPLESSLY AS THE LARGE REPTILIAN CREATURE SAILS THROUGH THE AIR WITH MIKO CAUGHT IN IT'S MOUTH. TIME SEEMED TO FLOW IN SLOW MOTION FOR CELESTE BUT IN REALITY IT ONLY TOOK AND INSTANT.

MIKO: NNNN...OOOOO.

CELESTE: MIIII...KOOO...

THE BEAST CLOSES IT'S MOUTH AND DIGS UNDERGROUND.

CELESTE: OH! GOD! MIKO!

MIKO: NNGH! NOO! SLIDING DOWN!

SAFE UNDERGROUND THE LARGE CREATURE SWALLOWS ITS PREY. IT FEELS HER STRUGGLING BODY FIGHTING HER DESCENT. THE CREATURE MAKES A SATISFYING GRIN AS MIKO SOON DEPOSITED IN HIS GROANING BELLY.

THE CREATURE'S FLAT BELLY EXTENDS AS MIKO FINALLY REACHES HIS STEAMING BELLY. THE BEAST SETTLES INTO HIS HOLE TO ALLOW HIS RATHER LARGE MEAL TO DIGEST IN PEACE.

MIKO: NNGH! HARD TO BREATHE! CAN'T END LIKE THIS!

BACK IN THE SURFACE.

CELESTE: SKY ARK THIS IS CELESTE! GOING TO THE SHIP TO RECON FOR MIKO! SHE HAS BEEN EATEN BY SOME LARGE REPTILE CREATURE!

MEANWHILE SAM SMITH BEGINS PREPARATIONS FOR THE EVACUATION OF THE AWAY TEAM WHEN SUDDENLY...

SAM: DON'T GET WHY CELESTE ONLY WANTED TO TAKE TWO ON THE AWAY TEAM...

A LARGE FLASH OF LIGHT APPEARS IN FRONT OF HIM.

SAM: NNGH! WHAT THE HELL? IS OUR SHIP UNDER ATTACK?

SAM LOOKS UP AND SEES A FAMILIAR PERSON.

SAM: IT... IT CAN'T BE... I MUST BE DREAMING...

GIRL: NNG! WHU?

SAM: ITS YOU! IT IS REALLY YOU! MY BELOVED... DEBRA...

DEBRA: SSAM... NNGH... HOLD ME.... UHH....

ELSEWHERE ON THE SKY ARK, CAPTAIN LEFLEUR IS ENJOYING SOME OF THE PERKS OF BEING ONE OF THE ONLY THREE MEN LEFT ON A SHIP WITH SEVEN WOMEN.

GIRL: (GASP)(GIGGLE!) OH MY! CAPTAIN!

DANtE: SO GORGEOUS!

GRABS HER BREAST.

KARINA: MMM... FEELS GOOD.

INSERTS HIS DICK TO HER PUSSY.

DANtE: I WANT TO MAKE YOU MINE KARINA!

KARINA: TAKE ME CAPTAIN LEFLEUR.

DANtE: PLEASE... NNGH! CALL ME DANtE...

KARINA: GUH! NNGH! DANTE!!!

COMM: CAPTAIN LEFLEUR TO THE BRIDGE IMMEDIATELY! PRIORITY DISTRESS SENT BY AWAY TEAM.

DANtE: DAMMIT!

KARINA: IF YOU HAVE TO GO I UNDERSTAND.

DANtE: HELL NO! MY FIRST OFFICER IS FULLY CAPABLE OF HANDLING THIS SITUATION.

KARINA: SHH... IIIT. SO GOOD!

DANtE: RIGHT NOW I WANT YOU!

KARINA: NNGH! OGK! COMING! GOD YOU DO ME RIGHT!

COMM.: CAPTAIN LEFLEUR TO THE BRIDE!

KARINA: NNGH! UNN... MMM... GAH... YOU SHOULD GO SOON... SOUNDS IMPORTANT!

DANtE: SHUT UP! HUFF... HUFF... NNGH! COMING!

KARINA: OH GOD! I FEEL IT!

BACK ON THE PLANET.

CELESTE: GOTTA STAY PUT... THEY WILL BE HERE SOON...

T-REX: GROWL!

CELESTE: EEEP! OH SHIT!

T-REX: GRRR,,,,, GROWL!!!

CELESTE: GOD, YOU LOOK HUNGRY!

THE T-REX KNOCKS HER OUT WITH A SWIPE OF A CLAW.

CELESTE: NNGH! OH GOD! EEYAHH!

FALLS TO THE GROUND.

CELESTE: NUH... NO... UHN...

THE LARGE BEAST INSPECTS HIS UNCONSCIOUS MEAL AS HE PREPARES TO TAKE CELESTE BACK TO HIS LAIR TO DEVOUR AT HIS LEISURE. ALL THE WHILE CAPTAIN LEFLEUR ENTERTAINS HIMSELF WITH THE LOVELY KARINA, WHO HAS NOW GIVEN UP TRYING TO GET THE PRE-OCCUPIED CAPTAIN TO ASSIST IN CELESTE'S RESCUE.

KARINA: LOVE IT FROM BEHIND! GO DEEPER DANtE! OHHH!

DANtE: NNGH! NICE AND TIGHT.

THE LARGE BEAST HAS NEVER SEEN FOOD LIKE THIS BEFORE. HE CAREFULLY PICKS UP CELESTE AND MAKES HIS WAY BACK TO HIS UNDERGROUND LAIR TO FEST ON HER.

NOTE: THE CHOICES ARE VERY LONG.

PATH 1: MIKO GETS COMPLETELY DIGESTED AND CELESTE IS EATEN BY THE LARGE LEOPARD CREATURE AND IS DIGESTED COMPLETELY AS WELL. MARCUS AND JOANNA GO TO THE SURFACE PREPARED FOR BATTLE AND FIND NOTHING BUT TROUBLE.

PATH 2: MIKO STRUGGLES ENOUGH FOR THE CROCODILE TO REGURGITATE HER. THE CREATURE RE-GROUPS FOR ROUND TWO TO EAT MIKO. AS SHE IS BEING SWALLOWED SHE IS SAVED BY MARCUS AND JOANNA. CELESTE IS EATEN AND DIGESTED.

PATH 3: MIKO IS DIGESTED COMPLETELY. CELESTE IS SAVED BY MARCUS AND JOANNA, BUT ALL THREE ARE ATTACKED BY MORE SNAKE CREATURES. MARCUS IS KILLED AND THEIR SHUTTLES ARE NOWHERE TO BE FOUND. CELESTE AND JOANNA ARE EATEN BY THE SNAKE CREATURES.

PATH 4: MIKO STRUGGLES AND IS REGURGITATED BY THE CROCODILE. CELESTE IS EATEN BY THE LARGE ANIMAL, BUT IS SAVED BY MARCUS AND JOANNA BEFORE SHE IS DIGESTED. MIKO ESCAPES THE CROCODILE AND ALL FOUR AWAY TEAM MEMBERS RE-GROUP. THEY FIND THEIR SHUTTLES DESTROYED BY THE CREATURES ON THE PLANET AND MUST NOW FIND ANOTHER WAY TO GET THE SKY ARK 5 TO COME TO RESCUE THEM. AT THE END THEY ARE ATTACKED BY MORE SNAKE CREATURES.

PATH 5: MIKO AND CELESTE ARE BOTH EATEN AND DIGESTED. MARCUS AND JOANNA ARRIVE TO SAVE THEM BUT ARE ATTACKED BY LARGE SNAKE CREATURES. MARCUS IS INJURED HORRIBLY AND JOANNA IS EATEN AND DIGESTED.
11.title: ROUGH START

113.content:
CHAPTER 2: RESCUE

A STRANGE PLANET BOASTS STRANGE LIFE. MORE SO THAN THIS REPTILIAN CREATURE WHO HAS RISEN FROM HI UNDERGROUND LAIR TO FIND SOME SUN TO WARM UP UNDER AND DIGEST HIS MEAL...

...A VERY SCARED AND DETERMINED MEAL.

MIKO: NNGH! STOMACH ACID COATING ME!

INSIDE THIS CHURNING GULLET, MIKO TAKASKA TRIES TO FIGHT BACK TO KEEP FROM BEING DIGESTED BY THE LARGE BEAST. HER PLANS SOON FADE AS HER CONSCIOUSNESS FADES.

MIKO: SO TIRED... CAN'T HOLD ON....

ALMOST AT THE SAME TIME, BOTH MIKO AND THE CREATURE FADE INTO SLEEP.

GALLON UPON BRUNING GALLON OF DIGESTIVE JUICES RAINS DOWN UPON MIKO'S YOUNG ASIAN BODY. HER BREASTS JIGGLE AS THE STOMACH SHIFTS HER AROUND. A FEW WHIMPERS ESCAPE HER LIPS.. THEN ALL IS QUIET EXCEPT FOR THE CHURNING GULLET HOLDING MIKO PRISONER.

MIKO: CELESTE.. HELP.. ME...

ELSEWHERE ON THE STRANGE WORLD, ANOTHER BEAST MAKES HIS WAY TO HIS CAVE HOVEL TO ENJOY SOME NEWLY CAPTURED HUMAN MEAT.

GETTING A MOUTHFUL OF SYNTHETIC SHELL SURROUNDING THIS MEAL, MAKES THE CREATURE DECIDE THAT IT HAS TO TAKE AN EXTRA STEP TO GET THE SOFT MEAT FROM INSIDE.

CELESTE: HUH... NNNGH... WHAT.. HAPPENED..

THE BEAST RIPS THE TORSO ARMOR OFF OF CELESTE AND SPITS IT OUT AND CONTINUES WITH THE REST.

CELESTE: MIKO... GOTTA SAVE... MIKO.

THE CREATURE SNIFFS CELESTE'S BODY. STILL UNSATISFIED WITH THE RUBBERY COATING AROUND HER, HE REALIZES HE HAS ONE MORE LAYER TO REMOVE.

CELESTE: NNGH! SO DIZZY..

THE BEAST RIPS THE RUBBER SUIT OFF OF CELESTE'S BODY. NOW THAT CELESTE'S ARMOR HAS BEEN COMPLETELY REMOVED. THE CREATURE LOOKS DOWN AT HER GLISTENING TAN SKIN. HER LARGE BREASTS SHIFT LEFT AND RIGHT AS SHE STIRS TRYING TO GAIN CONSCIOUSNESS. THE BEASTS SMELLS HER BODY.

CELESTE: DIZZY... NNGH!

CELESTE'S LEGS ARE THEN IN THE BEAST'S MOUTH, WHICH RESULTED IN CELESTE WAKING UP.

CELESTE: NNGH! PLEASE DON'T EAT ME.. DON'T EAT MEEE!

CELESTE FUTILELY TRIES TO PUSH THE CREATURES LARGE MAW AWAY FROM HER... HER ATTEMPT FAILS UTTERLY.

CELESTE: NNGH! STOP... PLEASE!

CELESTE SLOWLY ENTERS THE BEAST'S MOUTH LEAVING HER ARMS, BREASTS, AND HEAD FREE.

CELESTE: SOMEONE! HELP MEE!

CELESTE'S BREASTS AND ARMS ARE THEN IN THE BEAST'S MOUTH.

CELESTE: (SOB) DON'T WANNA DIE...

CELESTE'S HEAD IS THEN COVERED.

CELESTE: OGK! CRUSHING ME... (GASP!) NUH.. NUH..

THE BEAST'S MOUTH OPENS WIDE AND COVERS HER ENTIRE HEAD.

CELESTE: OGK! GUH! SHIT...

THE BEAST SAVORS CELESTE'S BODY FOR A FEW MORE SECONDS BEFORE HE BEGINS THE LAST SWALLOW. CELESTE ALREADY SHOWS SIGNS OF PASSING OUT FROM THE CONSTANT CHEWING.

CELESTE: ..NOT LIKE THIS..

THE CREATURE FEELS CELESTE'S SOFT YOUNG BODY SLOWLY SLIDING DOWN HIT THROAT. SHE WAS A DELICIOUS MEAL FOR SURE. THEN HE FELT HER SPLASH INTO HIS WAITING STOMACH TO BE DIGESTED. UNTIL...

MARCUS: NOT SO FAST DINO-DOG!

MARCUS READY AND FIRES HIS LASER RIFLE AND BLOWS THE BEAST'S HEAD OFF.

MARCUS: ADIOS MUTHA-FUCKA!

THE HEADLESS STUMP OF THE CREATURE SPEWS THE LAST FEW DROPS OF IT'S LIFE GIVING BLOOD ONTO THE COLD CAVE FLOOR.

JOANNA; GOOD SHOT BABE.

MARCUS: THANKS! CELESTE MUST BE INSIDE IT ACCORDING TO THE RFID SCANNER.

JOANNA: WE GOTTA FIND SOMETHING TO CUT HER OUT.

JUST THEN CELESTE'S REACHES OUT OF THE BEAST'S STOMACH.

MARCUS: TOUGH GIRL! LETS PULL HER OUT!

LATER...

MARCUS: WE GOTTA GET THE FUCK OUTTA HERE!

JOANNA: CELESTE. WE DON'T HAVE MUCH TIME.

CELESTE: I'M SURE. NNGH! GIVE ME A SEC...

JOANNA" THERE ARE CREATURES ALL OVER THIS PLANET.

MARCUS: WE CAN'T COLONIZE HERE.

CELESTE: I TOLD MIKO THAT. DID YOU FIND HER?

MARCUS: NOT YET. YOU WERE THE FIRST RFID SIGNAL WE READ WHEN WE GOT HERE.

CELESTE: THE MONSTER THAT ATE HER WENT UNDERGROUND.

JOANNA: THAT'S A PROBLEM.

MARCUS: HIGH CONCENTRATION OF REFRACTIVE METALS IN THE SOIL MAKE IT HARD TO DETECT MIKO.

CELESTE: WE GOTTA DO SOMETHING!

JOANNA: WE'RE TRYING CELESTE.

MARCUS: THE SKY ARK IS USING ALL IT'S RESOURCES TO FIND HER FROM THE ORBIT.

JOANNA: ONE THEY PINPOINT HER LOCATION WE WILL MOVE IN TO GET HER.

CELESTE: SOUNDS LIKE A PLAN. WHAT DO WE DO NOW?

MARCUS: WE WAIT UNTIL WE GET THE CALL.

JOANNA: WE NEED TO GET YOU SOME CLOTHES.

CELESTE: GOOD! I'M FREEZING!

JOANNA: THERE'S SOME BACK AT THE SHUTTLE.

JUST THEN THEY HERE FOOTSTEPS. MARCUS READIES HIS RIFLE.

MARCUS: WHAT'S THAT SOUND?

UNKNOWN TO HIM A BEAST WITH MANTIS ARMS SNEAKS BEHIND HIM.

MARCUS: THOUGHT I HEARD SOMTH..

BEFORE HE COULD FINISH THE BEAST CUTS HIS HEAD OFF.

JOANNA: MARCUS! OH GOD! MARCUS!?!?

MARUCS' HEADLESS BODY SLUMPS TO THE GROUND IN A HEAP.

BEAST: WELCOME LADIES!

JOANNA: WHAT IS IT CELESTE.

CELESTE: DON'T RUN JOANNA. HE CAN CATCH US. BUT HE WON'T HURT US. THIS IS A KAHL BUCKKILLER?

KAHL: YOU HEARD OF UUS? GOOD. SO YOU I HAVE NO DESIRE TO CUT OFF YOUR PRETTY LITTLE HEADS. I ONLY HUNT MALES.

CELESTE: YOU HERD FOR THE GLUTTON KAHLS... IF YOU ARE HERE THEN A GLUTTON ISN'T FAR BEHIND.

KAHL: RIGHT AGAIN.

JOANNA: I DON'T UNDERSTAND. HOW DID THE KAHL GET HERE?

CELESTE: THEY WILL NEVER LEAVE US ALONE....

JOANNA: WE HAVE TO WARN THE SKY ARK BEFORE THE SHIP GETS OVERRUN!

CELESTE: HE WON'T LET US LEAVE.

JOANNA: THERE ARE TWO OF US AND ONE OF HIM...

KAHL: SO WARN YOUR CREW WE ARE COMING.. I AM IN A SPORTING MOOD SO I WILL GIVE YOU A TEN MINUTE HEAD START... HEH.

THE TWO RUN TO WHERE THEY LAND THE SHUTTLE.

CELESTE: HOW THE HELL DID THIS HAPPEN?

JOANNA: I HAVE AN IDEA HOW... WE GOT A STOW AWAY ON BOARD. HER NAME IS DEBRA.. SHE CAME THROUGH A PORTAL. THE KAHL MUST HAVE USED THAT PORTAL AND FOLLOWED HER. SOMETHING TELLS ME WE MAY NOT HAVE A SHIP TO RETURN TO.

CELESTE: WELL WE CAN'T WAIT AROUND HERE AND FIND OUT.

JOANNA: SHUTTLE'S OVER THERE...

CELESTE: YOU HEAR SOMETHING?

UNKNOWN TO THEM A SNAKE DRAGON MAKE A SWOOP ON THEM.

JOANNA: CELESTE! WATCH OUT!!

CELESTE: WHU?

THE SNAKE DRAGON CATCH CELESTE WITH IT'S MOUTH HEAD FIRST.

CELESTE: MMPH! NUU!

JOANNA: NNGH! WHAT THE....

CELESTE: NUUU! MMPH!

CELESTE'S WET TAN BODY SLID DOWN THE BACK OF THE CREATURE'S MOUTH. HER STRUGGLING BODY ONLY SPEEDS UP HER DECENT. HER MUFFLED SCREAMS SOON FADE OUT AS HER HEAD ENTERS THE ESOPHAGUS.

CELESTE: MMMPH! OGK! NUUU!

JOANNA: CELESTE.. NO.. NOT LIKE THIS..

JOANA WATCHED HELPLESSLY AS CELESTE SLID DOWN THE CREATURE'S GULLET.

CELESTE: MMPH!

INSIDE, CELESTE'S VOLUPTUOUS BODY JIGGLED AND SQUIRMED AS SHE DESCENDED THE LONG NECK OF THE CREATURE. HER GLISTENING WET BODY MADE HER SWALLOWING ALL TOO EASY.

CELESTE: JOANNA! HELP MEEE! GET HELP! OH GOD HE'S REARING HIS HEAD!

THE BOLUS OF FOOD THAT WAR CELESTE COULD BE SEEN MOVING DOWN THE CREATURE'S LONG NECK.

CELESTE: NNGH! CRUSHING ME!

FINALLY CELESTE'S YOUNG BODY ENTERED THE CREATURE'S BELLY. A MUFFLED SPLASH COULD BE HEARD AS CELESTE FOUND THE STRENGTH TO SCREAM DUE TO HER NEW FOUND TORMENT.

CELESTE: MMMPH! NUUUU! HULF... MUH...

JOANNA: IT ATE CELESTE... GOD...

JOANNA TRIES TO RUN ONLY TO FIND HER ANKLE SPRAINED.

JOANNA: NNGH MY ANKLE.. DAMMIT!

THE BEAST THEN CATCHES HER LEGS.

JOANNA: OWW.. OWW... NO...

WITH GREAT FORCE, JOANNA IS TOSSED INTO THE AIR. NOW SHE FINDS HERSELF TOTALLY AT THE WHIM OF THIS STRANGE CREATURE...

JOANNA: NOO! EYAHHH!!

AS SHE FELL BACK TO THE GROUND THE SERPENT KEPT A CALCULATED EYE ON THE HELPLESS PREY.. WAITED FOR THE TIME TO STRIKE...

THEN...

JOANNA: GOD DON'T EAT ME! NOOOO!!! MMMPH!!! NUUUU!!!! OGK! HUKKK!

JOANNA KICKED WILDLY AS SHE WAS SWALLOWED HEAD FIRST INTO THE CREATURE'S MAW.

JOANNA: (SOB) NUUU! HUKK.. HUKK..

FINALLY IT WAS OCER.. JOANNA SLID DOWN THE CREATURE'S THROAT AND MADE THE LONG TRIP TO THE CREATURE'S STOMACH...

INSIDE, CELESTE FINDS HERSELF, AGAIN, WITHIN THE CHURNING BELLY OF SOME HORRID CREATURE. GALLON UPON GALLON OF BURNING DIGESTIVE FLUID POURS ONTO HER SLICK, TAN, JIGGLING BODY....

..THEN JOANNA SLIDES IN TO JOIN HER...

JOANNA: PFAUGH! CELESTE... YOU. ARE.. ALIVE.. (HUFF)

CELESTE: JOANNA.. NO.. HE ATE YOU TOO?!?

JOANNA: NNGH! STOMACH PUSHING ME IN...

CELESTE: WH.. WHAT ARE WE GOING TO DO?

JOANNA: WE'RE GONNA FIND OUR WAY OUTTA HERE...

THE SATISFIED CREATURE FLIES OFF TO FIND A NICE PLACE TO DIGEST HIS MEAL..

LATER, ELSEWHERE, NEAR SOME OUTCROPPINGS, THE LARGE REPTILE THAT ATE MIKO SLEEPS AWAY. HIS NOURISHING MEAL STILL CHURNS INSIDE HIS BRUTAL GULLET....

.. AT LEAST WHAT'S LEFT OF HIS NOURISHING MEAL.

PATH 1: CELESTE AND JOANNA ARE DIGESTED. A NEW AWAY TEAM IS SENT TO FIND THE MISSING CREW MEMBERS. DEBRA REVEALS TO THE CREW WHY SHE IS HERE.

PATH 2: CELESTE AND JOANNA FIND A WAY OUT OF THE SNAKE DRAGON'S BELLY. THEY CONFRONT THE LARGE INSECT THE TOLD THEM ABOUT THE LOOMING KAHL AMBUSH. THEY ARE ATTACKED BY GLUTTON AN ARE EATEN.
113.title: RESCUE

1133.content:
PATH 3: CELESTE AND JOANNA ARE DIGESTED. BRIANNA TAKES A SHUTTLE TO THE SURFACE TO FIND OUT MORE ABOUT THE PLANET. SHE IS ATTACKED AND EATEN.

PATH 4: CELESTE AND JOANNA ARE DIGESTED. SENSING TROUBLE, DEBRA CONVINCES THE CREW TO LAND THE SKY ARK TO THE SURFACE SO THEY CAN USE THE FORCE OF NUMBERS TO FINDS THE MISSING CREW MEMBERS AND TO EVADE GLUTTON'S TELEPORTATION RANGE.

PATH 5: CELESTE AND JOANNA FIND A WAY OUT OF THE SNAKE DRAON'S BELLY. THEY ARE IMMEDIATELY ATTACKED AND EATEN BY GLUTTON. LATER, BRIANNA AND DEBRA ARE ATTACKED BY GLUTTON WHO HAS SINCE TELEPORTED BACK ON THE SHIP. THEY ARE BOTH EATEN, ALL FOUR GIRLS TRY TO ESCAPE, BUT FAIL. BY THE END OF THE ISSUE; SOME ARE LOSING CONSCIOUSNESS.
1133.title: 3 MORE

11333.content:
CHAPTER 3: ATTACKING THE CLONE

JOANNA: NNGH! GUH!

CELESTE AND JOANNA SLOWLY DIGEST INSIDE THE SLOBBERY STOMACH OF THE LARGE SNAKE CREATURE THAT ATE THEM ONLY MOMENTS AGO. THEIR WET BODIES SLIDE AGAINST EACH OTHER, NOT WITH A PASSION FOR EACH OTHER BUT WITH A PASSION FOR SURVIVAL. THEY TRY TO CHOKE BACK THE CAUSTIC FUMES THAT ARE SLOWLY SUFFOCATING THEM.

MEANWHILE, OUTSIDE THEIR SLIMY TOMB, THE SNAKE BEAST LOOKS FOR A SAFE PLACE TO REST AND DIGEST THE TWO VOLUPTUOUS MORSELS.

JOANNA: NNGH.. CAN'T MOVE..

CELESTE: NNGH! JOANNA..

JOANNA: GOD CELESTE! ACIDS.. BURNING!

CELESTE: I KNOW! I KNOW! NNGH!

JOANNA: NOTHING'S WORKING.. WE CAN'T MOVE ENOUGH TO DO ANYTHING..

CELESTE: WE'RE GONNA BE DIGESTED?!?

JOANNA: CAN'T END LIKE THIS.. NNNGH! DAMMIT!

THE SNAKE BEAST FEELS HIS MEAL SLOWLY BEGIN TO TIRE. HE SMILES AT THEIR STRUGGLES. HE KNOWS IT WILL BE OVER SOON AND HE WILL BEGIN EXTRACTING THEIR VITAL NUTRIENTS. FINALLY SEEING A SAFE SPOT THE SERPENT SETTLES DOWN FOR A LONG NIGHT OF DIGESTING A WONDERFUL MEAL.

A MEAL THAT IS FINALLY GIVING UP HOPE FOR RESCUE.

JOANNA: GETTING TIRED.. SO SORRY CELESTE..

CELESTE: AT LEAST WE'RE TOGETHER.. (SOB)

THE SERPENT'S BELLY MAKES THE SOUNDS OF BREWING BELCH AS THE LAST FEW CUBIC METERS OF LIFE GIVING AIR LEAVES HIS BELLY..

JOANNA: AIR RUSHING OUT..

CELESTE: NNGH! IT'S TOO LATE.. WE'RE DOOMED..

JOANNA: OUR LAST BIT OF AIR IS RUSHING OUT?!?

... AND ESCAPES BETWEEN HIS RAZOR SHARP TEACH THE TWO GIRLS QUICKLY BEGIN TO PASS OUT...

JOANNA: SO SORRY CELESTE.. NNNGH..

CELESTE: IT'S OKAY.. JOANNA.. KUKKK.. NNGH

ON THE SKY ARK 5. DEBRA AND SAM MAKE UP FOR LOST TIME...

SAM: MMM.. MISSED YOU BABE..

DEBRA: TAKE ME SAM!

SAM: HUFF! HUFF! NNGH!

DEBRA: SOOO GOOD.. NNGH!

THE TWO YOUNG LOVERS CELEBRATE LIFE WITH EACH OTHER EVEN IN THE MOST DIRE OF TIMES.

SAM: NNGH! FUCK! SO GOOD!

DEBRA: NNGH! COMING..

DEBRA: I KNOW IT'S DIFFICULT.. BUT IT'S STILL ME..

SAM: EVEN IF YOU ARE A CLONE..

LATER..

SAME: WE NEVER HEARD FROM THE AWAY TEAM. I STILL NEED TO TELL THE CAPTAIN ABOUT YOU... I'M SURE YOU WILL BE FINE IN HERE TILL I GET BACK.

DEBRA: THAT'S FINE SAM.. I WILL BE FINE...

DEBRA: (THOUGHT) SAM IS STILL SO WONDERFUL B-KOM WAS SO THOUGHTFUL TO SEND A CLONE OF ME HERE SO WE COULD BE TOGETHER.

DEBRA: I'M SURE IT IS JUST ATMOSPHERIC INTERFERENCE OR SOMETHING.

SAM: YEAH. AT LEAST IT'S NOT THE KAHL.

SAM LEAVES. SUDDENLY, DEBRA FALLS TO THE FLOOR. HER HEAD THROBS WITH PAIN.

DEBRA: (THOUGHT) NNGH! FEELS LIKE I DID BEFORE I TELEPORTED HERE.. IT'S NOT POSSIBLE.. I AM ALMOST SURE THAT A PORTAL IS GOING TO OPEN!

JUST THEN A PORTAL SHOWS UP AND A BEAST CRAWLS OUT OF IT.

GLUTTON: DEBRA CLONE #3.. WELCOME TO YOUR DOOM...

THE PORTAL THE CLOSES.

GLUTTON: I SUPPOSE YOU DESERVE AN EXPLANATION.... WHEN B-KOM REPLICATED YOU IN THE PORTAL (PREDATOR PLANET CHAPTER 6. I WAS IN TRANSIT AT A DIFFERENT PORTAL...

DEBRA: NO..

GLUTTON: YES.. APPARENTLY I DEVELOPED THE ABILITY TO TRACE OUR SIGNAL AND TELEPORT TO THE LOCATION OF ANY OF YOU CLONES. I ATE AND DIGESTED THE ORIGINAL YOU... I MUST SAY YOU CLONES ARE NOT AS TASTY AS THE ORIGINAL. AND AS I DO APPRECIATE MY NEW POWERS... I STILL MUST FINISH MY MISSION AND EAT ALL THIRTY CLONES.

DEBRA: GET.. GET AWAY! SAM!!

STILL STUNNED BY GLUTTON'S TELEPORT, DEBRA IS UNABLE TO FIGHT BACK AGAINST HIS INSATIABLE ATTACK.

DEBRA: NO! NNGH! DIZZY.. SAM! HELP ME PLEASE!!!

DEBRA SLIDES DEEPER AND DEEPER INTO GLUTTON'S MOUTH. HE USES HIS TONGUE IN EXPERT FASHION AS HE CONTINUES TO GULP DOWN HIS TASTY PRIZE.

DEBRA: NNGH! (THOUGHT) CRUSHING ME! GOTTA FIGHT BACK!

FINALLY, THE YOUNG CLONE IS SWALLOWED DOWN INTO GLUTTON'S TIGHT GULLET. HER FEEBLE SCREAMS COULD BE HEARD AS SHE SLIDES DOWN HIS SLIMY THROAT.

DEBRA: MMMPH! NUUU!

GLUTTON: GAHH! YESS.. THREE DOWN, TWENTY SEVEN TO GO.. YOUR FEEBLE PLANS ARE NO MATCH FOR MY CUNNING, DEBRA. ENJOY YOUR STAY IN MY BELLY!

INSIDE GLUTTON'S BELLY, A YOUNG GIRL NAMED BRIANNA SITS AND SLOWLY DIGESTS. SHE FEELS HER AIR SLOWLY RUNNING OUT.

BRIANNA: (GASP)(GASP) THIS.. IS.. IT... PASSING OUT...

SHE IS SAVED BY A SUDDEN RUSH OF STALE AIR AND THE SQUIRMING BODY OF DEBRA.

BRIANNA: (GASP) AIR! FINALLY! AIR! OH GOD! THANK YOU FOR BEING HERE.. DON'T WANT TO DIE ALONE..

DEBRA: DON'T PLAN ON DYING. JUST YET. WHO ARE YOU?

BRIANNA: NAME'S BRIANNA.. I STOWED AWAY ON THE SKY ARK. I WAS IN THE CARGO HOLD STEALING SOME FOOD, WHEN THAT KAHL GLUTTON ATE ME.. HE'S NOT ALONE.. HE'S WITH A BUCKKILLER.. THE MEN ARE IN A LOT OF DANGER!

DEBRA: WE GOTT GET OUTTA HERE BEFORE WE RUN OUT OF AIR. I DON'T HAVE ANY PLANS TO BE DIGESTED ANY TIME SOON!

GLUTTON TELEPORTS AGAIN. LEAVING THE SKY ARK SAFE FOR NOW. HE FEELS THE TWO GIRLS IN HIS BELLY SLOSHING AROUND TRYING TO FIND A WAY OUT. AS HE VANISHES, HE SMILES IN SATISFACTION.

GLUTTON: SO.. THERE ARE MORE MORSELS ON THE PLANET BELOW? HOW NICE. I AM SURE I HAVE ROOM FOR THEM! ENJOY YOUR STAY DEBRA! YOU ARE ABOUT TO HAVE SOME COMPANY!

BACK ON THE PLANET BELOW..

JOANNA AND CELESTE CLING TO LIFE ONLY BARELY AS THEY ARE SLOWLY DIGESTED IN THE SERPENT'S TIGHT CHURNING BELLY.

CELESTE: NNGH! NU.. NO..

SUDDENLY..

A BUCKKILLER JUST IN FRONT OF THE DRAGON.

JOANNA AND CELESTE BREATHE THEIR LAST....

THE BUCKKILLER CUTS OFF THE DRAGON IN HALF.

KAHL: DINNER IS SERVED LORD GLUTTON!

CELESTE AND JOANNA SLIDE OUT OF THE SERPENT'S THROAT IN A SPLASH OF BILE AND SWEAT.

JOANNA: NNGH!

GLUTTON: GOOD JOB MY SERVANT! THEY LOOK SCRUMPTIOUS.

JOANNA: CELESTE.... WE'RE FREE!

CELESTE: NNGH! HOW?

JOANNA: DON'T KNOW..

CELESTE: GET OFF ME..

JOANNA: HUFF.. SORRY..

CELESTE: CAN'T BELIEVE OUR LUCK..

JOANNA: WE SHOULD WATCH OUT.. THIS IS TOO WEIRD...

CELESTE: YOU HEAR SOMETHING?
11333.title: ATTACKING THE CLONE PART 1

113331.content:
GLUTTON: IT'S DINNER TIME LADIES!

JOANNA: WHA? HELP ME CEELSTE!

CELESTE: JOANNA! NNGH! LESS LIKE JELLY! CAN'T MOVE!

JOANNA'S LARGE BREASTS BOUNCED WILDLY AS SHE IS SCOOPED UP INTO GLUTTON'S MAW.

JOANNA: GOD IT'S EATING MEEE!!!

CELESTE: (THOUGHT) CAN'T BELIEVE THIS.. SAVED FROM ONE CREATURE ONLY TO BE EATEN BY ANOTHER.

JOANNA: MMPH!

CELESTE: NNGH! GOTTA GET HELP!

EXHAUSTED, CELESTE CURLS UP IN TERROR AS SHE WATCHES JOANNA MEET A SLOBBERY FATE.

JOANNA: CELESTE! NOOO!!!!

CELESTE: JOANNA.. NO..

FULLY IN GLUTTON'S MOUTH, JOANNA FEELS HER HEAD GETTING STUFFED INTO THE BEAST'S ESOPHAGUS.

CELESTE: (WHIMPER) JOANNA... PLEASE... DON'T EAT ME...

JOANNA: MMOH! NUUU!!!

CELESTE: OH GOD, IT'S MY TURN.

GLUTTON: MMM! THAT WAS DELICIOUS!

CELESTE: (THOUGHT) STILL TOO WEAK, LEGS NUMB!

GLUTTON: CURIOUS AS TO WHY YOU ARE HANGING AROUND.. BUT NO MATTER..

CELESTE: I.. I.. PLEASE DON'T.

GLUTTON: YOU WILL MAKE A FINE DESSERT!

CELESTE: GET AWAY FROM ME!

CELESTE'S LEGS ENTERS GLUTTON'S MOUTH.

CELESTE: NOO! AIEEE!!

GLUTTON: MY BELLY AWAITS YOU YOUNG ONE.

CELESTE: MY FRIENDS WILL FIND YOU, YOU BASTARD!

REALIZING CELESTE WAS INCAPABLE OF ESCAPE, GLUTTON SAVORED HER TANNED YOUNG BODY VERY SLOWLY AS HE CREPT UP HER LEG WITH HIS MAW.

CELESTE: SOMEONE HELP MEE! NOOO!!! GAH! GET AWAY! GUH! NNGH! SHIT! I.. AM.. NOT GONNA LET YOU EAT ME! I WILL NOT LET YOU DIGEST ME!

CELESTE'S BODY IS HALFWAY INSIDE.

CELESTE: (THOUGHT) I SURVIVED BEING EATEN TWICE. IT CAN'T END LIKE THIS... IF THE CREW FINDS GLUTTON, THEY WILL SURELY BE KILLED.. HIS TONGUE.. SO WET AND SLOBBERY ON MY BACK CAN'T FIGHT BACK.

CELESTE: OOOH YOU BASTARD! I HOPE YOU CHOKE!

GLUTTON WORKS CELESTE DEEP INTO HIS MOUTH WHERE HIS POWERFUL JAWS PREPARE TO INFLICT THE NEXT STEP IN HIS DEVOURING PROCESS...

CELESTE: (THOUGHT) SLIDING IN! GOD IT'S REALLY HAPPENING.

INTENSE CHEWING. CELESTE IS ALMOST RENDERED UNCONSCIOUS BY THIS ATTACK.

CELESTE: NNGH! OGK! NUU!! (GASP) NNGH! PASSING OUT..

GLUTTON BEGINS TO SALIVATE AT THE MANY FLAVORS CELESTE BRINGS TO HIS PALLET. HAVING BEEN EATEN TWICE BEFORE HAD DEFINITELY MADE CELESTE MORE INTERESTING TO TASTE THAN OTHER HUMAN FEMALES.

CELESTE'S SALIVA COATED BODY UNDULATES AS SHE IS DRAWN IN FURTHER.

CELESTE: NNGH! PLEASE.. NO.. NNN.. CAN'T END LIKE THIS..

GLUTTON ROLLED CELESTE AROUND HIS MOUTH, SAMPLING HER MANY FLAVORS AS HE DRAWS HER TO THE BACK OF HIS MOUTH.

CELESTE: NNGH!

CELESTE'S WORLD GOES DARK AS GLUTTON CLOSES HIS MAW FOR THE LAST TIME. HE FEELS HER SLOBBER-COVERED BODY SLIDE INTO HIS TROAT.

CELESTE: HUK.. HUHHH..

CELESTE IS WORKED DOWN HIS THROAT. GLUTTON WAS VERY PLEASED AT HIS LATEST CONQUEST.

GLUTTON: MMMMM! I FEEL I MAY HAVE ROOM FOR A FEW MORE IN MY STOMACH!

INSIDE JOANNA, BRIANNA, AND DEBRA CHURN AND SLOSH ABOUT THE NOISY, CAUSTIC STOMACH. THEIR BODIES INTERTWINE AS THE STOMACHWALLS KNEED THEIR BODIES TOGETHER.

BRIANNA: NNGH! (GASP)

JOANNA: NNGH! ACID BURNING! CELESTE! HOPE YOU ARE GETTING HELP!

DEBRA: CAN'T END LIKE THIS..

CELESTE JOINS THE OTHER THREE GIRLS IN THE STOMACH. HER LEGS FINALLY GET TRACTION AND KICK IN PROTEST.. BUT IT IS TOO LATE. SHE BRINGS WITH HER ONLY THE SMALLEST SUPPLY OF AIR TO KEEP THE GIRLS ALIVE.

JOANNA: CELESTE? NOO! HE GOT YOU TOO?!? GOTTA FIND A WAY OUTTA HERE! SOME OF US ARE PASSING OUT ALREADY! CELESTE! WAKE UP! WE GOTTA FIGHT BACK! I KNOW ALL FOUR OF US COULD TURN THE TIDE... SO TIRED...

AN HOUR LATER..

GLUTTON: THERE.. THE LAST ONE FINALLY STOPPED MOVING..

KAHL: GOOD JOB MASTER.. LOOKS LIKE I HAVE SOME MALES TO KILL ON THE SHIP! WHEN DO WE DEPART?

GLUTTON: AS SOON AS I DIGEST THESE FOUR LOVELIES! I HAVE A FEELING IT WON'T BE LONG BEFORE I CAN COLLECT THEIR BONES!

PATH 1: GLUTTON COMPLETELY DIGESTS ALL FOR GIRLS. KARINA AND SHANNON ARE ATTACKED BY GLUTTON AND EATEN ON THE SHIP. CAPTAIN LAFLEUR TRIES TO SAVE THEM BUT IS KILLED.
113331.title: ATTACKING THE CLONE PART 2

1133312.content: PATH 2: DEBRA USES HER TELEPORTATION POWER TO TELEPORT HERSELF AND CELESTE OUT OF GLUTTON'S BELLY AND A FEW YARDS AWAT FROM GLUTTON. HE NOTICES THIS AND ATTACKS DEBRA IMMEDIATELY. TOO WEAK TO FIGHT, DEBRA IS EATEN AGAIN. CELESTE RUNS TO THE SHUTTLE BUT IS CAUGHT BY ANOTHER STRANGE CREATURE AND EATEN. GLUTTON TELEPORTS BACK TO THE SHIP TO START FEEDING ON THE OTHER GIRLS.
1133312.title: 4 MORE

11333121.content:
Chapter 4: Portals

BUCKKILLER: MASTER... I... HUNGER...

GLUTTON: I KNOW YOU NEED MALE BLOOD BUT I NEED YOU HERE IN CASE MY MEAL REVOLTS. I STILL SENSE SOME OF THEM ARE ALIVE.

INSIDE GLUTTON'S STOMACH DEBRA BRIEFLY REGAIN CONSCIOUS.

DEBRA: NNGH! WHU? NO CHOICE...

GLUTTON: JUST A FEW MORE MINUTES... ONE OF THEM IS STILL MOVING...

DEBRA: CAN ANYONE HEAR ME?

BUCKKILLER: I MUST HAVE BLOOD, MASTER. THERE ARE STILL MEN ON THE SHIP.

GLUTTON: YOU HAVE BEEN A FAITHFUL SERVANT. I DON'T THINK DEBRA WILL TRY ANYTHING NOW. YOU MAY LEAVE.

BUCKKILLER: THANK YOU MASER. AFTER I DISPATCH THE MALES I WILL CORALL THE REST OF THE FEMALES FOR YOU.

GLUTTON: EXCELLENT! IT WON;T BE LONG BEFORE MY LITTLE MORSELS WILL BE DIGESTED!

DEBRA: NNGH! ANYONE HEAR ME?!?

DEBRA'S CRIES HELP CELESTE REGAIN CONSCIOUS.

CELESTE: NNGH! WHU! WHO?

DEBRA: THERE ISN'T MUCH TIME.. TAKE MY HAND!

CELESTE: WH... WHO ARE YOU?

DEBRA: MY NAME'S DEBRA... I TELEPORTED ONTO YOUR SHIP. I AM A FRIEND OF SAM. I THINK WE CAN TELEPORT OUTTA HERE! I FEEL AN ENERGY SURGE. WE DON'T HAVE MUCH TIME OR AIR...

CELESTE: HOW... HOW CAN WE TELEPORT OUTTA THIS HELL?

DEBRA: YOU... YOU JUST HAVE TO TRUST ME.

CELESTE: O... OKAY...

GLUTTON SUDDENLY SOMETHING STRANGE IN HIS BELLY AS THE TWO GIRLS HOLD HANDS.

GLUTTON: NNGH! FEEL FUNNY...

DEBRA: I WAS MADE BY A PORTAL. THINK I CAN PORT ON MY OWN… I HOPE...

CELESTE: NNGH! ME TOO... BURNING... WHERE WILL WE TELEPORT…

DEBRA: NOT SURE... FIRST TIME DOING IT...

CELESTE: I WILL THINK OF THE SKY ARK. MAYBE WE CAN MATERIALIZE THERE...

DEBRA AND CELESTE: ...THE SKY ARK...

THE TWO GIRLS THEN GLOW.

CELESTE: IT.. IT;S WORK...

DEBRA (THOUGHT): NNGH! HEAD POUNDING! GOTTA THINK OF THE SHIP! SO TIRED...

DEBRA AND CELESTE VANISH, LEAVING JOANNA AND BRIANNA TO DIGEST IN GLUTTON'S CHURNING GUT.

GLUTTON: YELP! WHAT THE HELL!?! I KNEW IT! YOU FIGURED IT OUT YOU HUMAN BITCH! YOU FIGURED THAT YOU HAVE THE POWER TO TELEPORT. BUT BEFORE EVEN I MASTERED TELEPORTATION, I COULD NOT GO FAR! HEH! YOU ARE PROBABLY VERY CLOSE!

TO FILL THE VOID, GLUTTON'S STOMACH PUMPS MORE CAUSTIC ACID INTO HIS FLESHY GIRL FILLED CHAMBER WHERE JOANNA STILL CLINGING TO LIFE!

JOANNA: NNGH! ACID... BURNING... SOMEONE... HELP ME…

GLUTTON: DEBRA! WHERE ARE YOU DEBRA! WE HAVE SOME UNFINISHED BUSNINESS! HEH, PROTING CAUSES A SYNAPSE OVERLOAD. SHE IS PROBABLY SLEEPING LIKE A BABY!

JOANNA: CAN'T BREATHE... NNGH THIS IS IT...

AS JOANNA SINKS INTO OBLIVION CAPTAIN LEFLEUR MEETS WITH ENGINEER MINKOVINSKI.

KARINA: DANTE... SAM HAS REACHED THE PLANET'S SURFACE..

DANTE: IS ANGELA WITH HIM? OH, AND CALL ME CAPTAIN LEFLEUR WHILE ON DUTY...

KARINA: Y… YES CAPTAIN.

DANTE: IF THEY CAN'T FIND CELESTE AND THE REST OF THE TEAM WE SHOULD MAKE PREPARATIONS TO LEAVE.

KARINA: LEAVE? BUT…

DANTE: WE CAN’T AFFORD TO LOSE ANY MORE CREW MEMBERS TO A HOSTILE WORLD! THESE ARE SLIM TIMES MINKOVINSKI! WE MUST MAKE HARD DECISIONS IF WE ARE TO SURVIVE!

KARINA: I UNDERSTAND CAPTAIN, BUT THIS PLANET MAY BE WORTH A GOOD FIGHT! CELESTE'S LAST TRANSMISSION REVEALS SHE KILLED ONE OF THE NATIVE BEASTS THERE.

DANTE: SO YOU WOULD PREFER A WAR THAT COULD ENDANGER ALL OF US INSTEAD OF TRYING TO KEEP HUMANITY FROM THE BRINK OF DESTRUCTION!

KARINA: NO, CAPTAIN I… I JUST THINK…

RINAYA: ...SHE HAS A POINT CAPTAIN...

DANTE: (SIGH!) COMMANDER SIMMONS. IF YOU WANT TO FEED YOURSELVES TO THE BEASTS DOWN BELOW BY ALL MEANS, I WON’T STOP YOU! BUT IF THIS LATEST AWAY TEAM MISSION FAILS WE WILL HAVE TO VOTE ON WHAT TO DO.

RINAYA: SAM WON’T FAIL US. HE’S TAKING OUR ASSAULT TANK. ALSO WE HAVE ANOTHER ISSUE TO DEAL WITH. APPARENTLY WE HAVE SOME STOWAWAYS ON BOARD.

DANTE: STOWAWAYS? WELL I AM IN NO POSITION TO COMPLAIN, TE MORE HUMANS ON BOARD THE BETTER!

RINAYA: WELL NOT ALL OF THEM ARE HUMAN…

KARINA: WHAT DO YOU MEAN COMMANDER?

DANTE: YES, WHAT DO YOU MEAN? AND WHY WASN’T I NOTIFIED?

KARINA: CAPTAIN, I THINK IT WAS BECAUSE YOU AND I…

DANTE: … SHUT UP KARINA!

RINAYA: ONE IS A FORMER RESISTANCE FIGHTER BRIANNA SAKAI, SHE CONFIDED IN ME ABOUT HER PRESENCE. ANOTHER IS DEBRA ALONSO, SHE IS A “CLONE” OF A FORMER EARTH RESISTANCE FIGHTER. SHE HAS THE POWER TO TELEPORT APARENTLY. SHE TELEPORTED HERE WITH THE LAST STOWAWAY…

DANTE: A TELEPORTER, HUH? WHO IS THE LAST?

RINAYA: NOT SURE, SENSORS PICKED UP ANOTHER BEING TELEPORTING ABOARD. SOMETHING BIG, AND THAT WORRIES ME.

DANTE: IF DEBRA TELEPORTED HERE SHE MUST HAVE BEEN ON THE RUN. MAYBE SOMETHING FOLLOWED HER.

KARINA: YOU MEAN A KHAL? OH GOD! THEY ARE THE WHOLE REASON WE ARE OUT HERE PORTING AROUND THE UNIVERSE!?!

DANTE: CALM DOWN MINKOVININSKI…

KARINA: NO! YOU CALM DOWN, DANTE! AND WAKE UP! WE NEED TO HUNT THIS THING DOWN BEFORE IT EATS US ALL! I’VE BEEN EATEN BY A KHAL BEFORE, AND I DON’T PLAN TO BE EATEN AGAIN!

DANTE: KARINA… I KNOW HOW YOU FEEL. I WILL DO ALL IN MY POWER TO KEEP YOU SAFE. BT WE NEED TO SUIT UP IN CASE WHAT EVER IS STALKING US WILL NOT HAVE A GOOD DAY ONCE IT FINDS US.

KARINA: O… OKAY… JUST KEEP ME OUT OF A KHAL’S STOMACH, DANTE! KEEP ME SAFE!

ELSEWHERE…

GLUTTON: MY STOMACH ACHES FOR YOU DEBRA!

DEBRA: NNGH! (CAN’T MOVE… AT LEAST MY EYES ARE OPEN… DAMMIT, ON SOME PLANET… THIS MUST BE THE PLANET SAM WAS TELLING ME ABOUT. SHIT I GOTTA GET UP!)

GLUTTON: I CAN SMELL YOU GIRL!

DEBRA: NNGH! NUH! NO… (CRAP! I DIDN’T TELEPORT FAR AT ALL! THAT OTHER GIRL! HOPE SHE IS OKAY! AT LEAST WE ARE OUT OF GLUTTON’S STOMACH! IF I DON’T MOVE SOON I MAY END UP BACK IN THERE!) NNGH! SHIT…. NNNGH! AWE CRAP!

GLUTTON: WELL, WELL! LLOKS LIKE SOME LITTLE GIRL HAS SOME TALENT! WE CAN’T HAVE THAT CAN WE!

DEBRA: NUH! NOO!!

GLUTTON: IT IS TIME FOR THIS LITTLE GAME TO END, DEBRA! TIME TO JOIN YOUR THREE FRIENDS IN MY BELLY!

GLUTTON OPENS HIS MOUTH AND SWALLOWS DEBRA HEAD FIRST.

DEBRA: (THREE? NOO! HE ATE THE OTHER GIRL ALREADY?) YOU BASTARD JUST LEAVE ME ALONE! (IT CAN’T END LIKE THIS! WE WORKED TOO HARD FOR THIS!)

ONLY DEBRA’S LEGS REMAINS FREE AS GLUTTON LIFTS UP HIS HEAD.

DEBRA: (HE’S LIFTING ME UP! HE WON’T EVEN GIVE ME A CHANVE TO LIVE!) PLEASE GLUTTON! NOT NOW! I BEG YOU!

GLUTTON STARTS SWALLOWING.

DEBRA: NOOOO!!!! MMPH!

DEBRA’S SLIM SALIVA COATED BODY SLIDES HELPLESSLY DOWN GLUTTON’S THROAT. SHE FEELS THE COOL AIR BRUSH UP AGAINST HER LEGS AND BACK AS HER HEAD AND BREASTS ENTER GLUTTON’S THROAT.GLUTTON FEELS THE SATISFACTION OF DEBRA’S BODY SURRENDERING TO HIS POWERFUL HUNGER.

DEBRA: MMPH! NUUU!!!

EVENTUALLY HER ENTIRE BODY IS SWALLOWED.

GLUTTON: ULP! MMM! EVEN MORE DELICIOUS THE SECOND TIME! TIME TO UNLEASH MY STAGE TWO ACID TO FINISH YOU OFF! CAN’T TAKE A CHANCE OF YOU TELEPORTING AGAIN! OF COURSE I WILL BE MISSING OUT ON SOME NUTRIENTS, BUT THERE ARE MORE FEMALES ON THE SHIP TO CHOOSE FROM.

DEBRA KNOWS ALL TOO WELL WHAT STAGE TWO ACID IS CAPABLE OF. SHE FEELS HER HEART SINK AS SHE SLIDES DOWN GLUTTON’S THROAT.

DEBRA: STAGE TWO ACID? NOO!

DEBRA REACHES GLUTTON’S STOMACH.

GLUTTON: GAH! THERE YOU GO! YOU HAVE ABOUT TWO MINUTES BEFORE YOU ARE COMPLETELY ABSORBED! TOO BAD I WANTED YOU TO SUFFER! YEP, JUST LIKE CLOCKWORK… YOU FOUGHT HARD DEBRA, BUT IT’S OVER FOR YOU!

INSIDE, DEBRA’S PARTIALLY DIGESTED CARCASS FINALLY GIVES IN TO HER FATE.

ELSEWHERE ON THE PLANET…

CELESTE REGAINS CONSCIOUS.

CELESTE: NNGH! IT… IT WORKED! SHE DID IT! BUT I’M NOT ON THE SKY ARK! (GOTTA FIND THE TRANSPORT AND GET BACK TO THE SHIP! GOTTA CALL OFF ALL OTHER AWAY TEAM ATTEMPTS.)

SUDDENLY SHE FEELS THE GROUND SHAKING.

CELESTE: WHA? RUMBLING?

A LARGE WORM LIKE CREATURE BURSTS OUR OF THE GROUND AND ENGULFS CELESTE UP TO HER HIPS!

CELESTE: SHIT! IT’S A LOCAL! NNGH! SOMEONE HELP MEEE!!!

BEING DRAWN IN FURTHER, CELESTE TRIES TO FIGHT HER DESCENT. HER GLISTENING DOUBLED D BREASTS JIGGLING IN PROTEST.

CELSTE: NNGH! CRUSHING MEEE!!

EVENTUALLY ONLY HER HEAD REMAINS.

CELESTE: FOURTH TIME… BEEN EATEN FOUR TIMES! CAN’T END LIKE THIS!

CELESTE’S HEAD ENTERS THE MOUTH AND THE WORM STARTS CLOSING IT.

CELESTE: (NNGH! PRESSURE SO TIGHT! CAN BARELY BREATHE!) SAME! DEBRA!! HELP MEE…
CELESTE SEES HER LAST VIEW OF THE WORLD THROUGH JAGGED TEETH…

THE WORM CLOSES ITS MOUTH.

CELESTE: MMMPH!!!! NUU! NUUUU!!!!

… THEN SHE WAS GONE AS THE WORM SWALLOWS.

CELESTE: NOOO! AIIEEEE!

CELESTE SLIDES HELPLESSLY DOWN THE CREATURES THROAT AND SOON IN DEPOSITED INTO THE BEASTS BELLY TO BE DIGESTED.

PATH 1: SAM AND ANGELA RESCUE CELESTE FROM THE WORM CREATURE. THINKING HE MUST GO BACK TO THE SKY ARK, GLUTTON ATTACKS SHANNON AND RINAYA. HE EATS THEM AND DISCOVERS THAT CELESTE ESCAPED WITH DEBRA SO HE GOES BACK TO THE PLANET TO FIND HER.
11333121.title: PATH 2

113331212.content: PATH 2: CELESTE IS DIGESTED BY THE WORM CRETURE. SAM AND ANGELA ARE ATTACKED BY GLUTTON. SAM BATTES THE BUCKKILLER AND DIES. ANGELA IS EATEN BY GLUTTON AND IS DIGESTED.
113331212.title: 4 MORE

1133312122.content: PATH 3: SAM AND ANGELA FIND CELESTE STILL INSIDE THE WORM CREATURE. THEY RY TO KILL IT, BUT CAN’T SEEM TO TARGET IT WITH THEIR WEAPONS. SAM IS KILLED BY THE CREATURE AND ANGELA IS EATEN BY IT, JOINING CELESTE IN ITS BELLY.
1133312122.title: 3 MORE

11333121222.content:
PATH 4: THE BUCKKILLER RETURNS TO THE SHIP WHERE HE FINDS DANTE. DANTE KILLS THE BUCKKILLER AND TELLS KARINA TO SUIT UP AND TO FLY THE SKY ARK IN FOR A LANDING TO RESCUE THE REST OF THE CREW. GLUTTON INTERCETS KARINA AND EATS HER. DANTE IS NOT AWARE OF KARINA’S DELIMA DN LANDS THE SHIP. SAM AND ANGELA SAVE CELESTE FROM THE CREATURE.

PATH 5: RINAYA AND SHANNON COORDINATE WITH SAM ON THE SURFACE TO FIND CELESTE. BUT BEFORE THEY FIND THE WORM-LIKE CREATURE THAT ATE HER, CELESTE IS DIGESTED BEFORE THEY FIND HER. GLUTTON EATS RINAYA AND SHANNON IN MID ASSIST. DANTE AND KARINA CORNER GLUTTON FOR A FINAL BATTLE.
11333121222.title: 2 MORE

11333122.content: PATH 3: SAME AND ANGELA TAKE THE LAST SHUTTLE DOWN TO SAVE DEBRA. SAM IS KILLED BY THE BUCKKILLER. ANGELA IS EATEN BY GLUTTON AND JOINS THE OTHER GIRLS IN GLUTTON'S BELLY.
11333122.title: 3 MORE

113331222.content:
PATH 4: DEBRA USES HER TELEPORTATION POWER TO SAVE HERSELF AND JOANNA. THE TWO GIRLS RE-APPEAR TOO CLOSE TO GLUTTON. HE EATS DEBRA WHO IS TOO WEAK TO FIGHT. HE CHASES JOANNA INTO A GROTTO WHERE SHE IS TRAPPED BUT SAFE FROM GLUTTON'S REACH. SHE GET TO HEAR THE GURGLING SOUNDS OF GLUTTON WAITS OUT JOANNA'S PATIENCE.

PATH 5: KARINA AND RINAYA TAKE THE SHUTTLE TO THE SURFACE TO SAVE THEIR FRIENDS. THEY FIND GLUTTON AND CONFRONT HIM. THEY ARE EATEN BY HIM AFTER SEVERAL FAILED ATTEMPTS TO KILL HIM. THE TWO GIRLS JOIN THE OTHER SKY ARK CREW MEMBERS IN GLUTTON'S BELLY.
113331222.title: 2 MORE

info.brief_description: Based on the fan comics, but I decided what would happen if they went to different paths.
info.description: Based on the deviant comics series, but I decided what would happen if they went to different paths. However only I can write it, since I have contact with the true author, to give me ideas.
